text: tanre dasane (nabiye) oru ratriyil masjidul haramil ninn masjidul akhsayilekk - atinre parisaram nam anugrhitamakkiyirikkunnu- nisayatra ceyyiccavan etrayea parisud'dhan! nam'mute drstantannalil cilat addehattin nam kaniccukeatukkan ventiyatre atâ€Œ. tirccayayum avan (allahu) ellam kelkkunnavanum kanunnavanumatre
